EmailTemplate.name: Northam_Event_Defining_Data_Q115.EMC: Live Stream Reminder - Day of
EmailTemplate.subject: A New Approach to Big Data is Today, 2/17 @ 11AM
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
DEFINING DATA IN THE CLOUD ERA A Pivotal Strategy Update We look forward to you joining us for today's event A New Approach to Big Data. We have important information to share with you regarding live stream. If you are an EMC employee please use this link <http://dmpweb.corp.emc.com/New_Approach_to_Big_Data.asp> to access Pivotal's New Approach to Big Data webcast.
Join the Live Stream here <http://dmpweb.corp.emc.com/New_Approach_to_Big_Data.asp>
The event is today, 2/17 from 11:00AM to 12:30PM. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact us at info@pivotal.io <mailto:info@pivotal.io>.
Regards,
The Pivotal Team
